Three levels

  • Prediction:Given a dataset , the hypothesis learned from this dataset, and the value of . The prediction can be evaluated by the error .
  • Hypothesis: maps X to Y. It can be evaluated by the quality of predictions. It means that we want to measure the expected error of the hypothesis learned from some training set over the distribution .
  • Learner: maps dataset D to hypothesis h. It can be evaluated by the quality of hypothesis. It means that we want to measure the expectation of the performance of the hypotheses over different training datasets .
